product_name: Black Diamond Ultra Mountain Carbon Z-Pole Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The lightweight Black Diamond Ultra Mountain Carbon Z-Pole trekking poles offer durable support, easy packability and quick deployment, whether you're toting a heavy pack or riding backcountry powder. 100% carbon fiber shafts feature 3 sections and innovative Z-Pole compactibility to fit easily into your pack; speed-cone setup takes mere seconds. Lightweight EVA foam grips feature breathable, moisture-wicking straps and non-slip foam mini grips that extend down the poles for secure choke-ups. Black Diamond Ultra Mountain Carbon Z-Pole trekking poles feature flexible carbide tips and come with rubber tip covers, trekking baskets and powder baskets.
short_description: The lightweight Black Diamond Ultra Mountain Carbon Z-Pole trekking poles offer durable support, easy packability and quick deployment, whether you're toting a heavy pack or riding backcountry powder.
